data.title: Michelle Obama Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Michelle Obama on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Michelle Obama including The Queen at 90, The Hooping Life, and more.
data.text:
Moving Up

Ben, Leslie and Chris go to San Francisco for a National Parks conference; Tom opens his restaurant; Leslie is faced with a decision.

Homefront

hen a 14-year-old foils a home invasion, Gibbs suspects the teenager is withholding pertinent details. Also, Director Vance and Senior FBI Agent Fornell travel to London as part of the ongoing escaped British spy case.

iMeet the First Lady

A high-level government agency starts to inquire into the iCarly gang after they hack into a secure network to throw Carly's dad an online birthday party. *Guest Star - Michelle Obama

All or Nothing with Me

Rayna hosts a charity concert at a military base after she learns Luke was injured in Afghanistan.

OMG! That's Michelle Obama

First Lady Michelle Obama surprises the designers with one of the most exciting challenges of the season when one winning design will be manufactured and sold on landsend.com.
